reviews.text: Best bar food in Louisville! The Korean BBQ tacos are incredible. Casual vibe, great beer selection. Perfect spot to watch a game with friends.
reviews.author: Jason M.

reviews.text: Really good food for a bar. The wings are huge and flavorful. Gets crowded on weekends which means slower service. Worth the wait though.
reviews.author: Brittany L.

reviews.text: This place is a hidden gem. Don't let the dive bar appearance fool you - the food is seriously good. The schnitzel sandwich is amazing.
reviews.author: Mike R.

reviews.text: Food was good but nothing special. Very loud, hard to have a conversation. Beer selection is solid. Okay for casual drinks.
reviews.author: Susan K.

reviews.text: Love this place! Neighborhood bar with elevated food. The quesadillas are massive and delicious. Staff is friendly. Great atmosphere.
reviews.author: Tommy H.

reviews.text: Surprisingly good food for a sports bar. The bourbon selection is impressive. Can get smoky inside. Outdoor seating is nice when weather permits.
reviews.author: Rachel P.

reviews.text: My go-to spot for casual dining. The menu has something for everyone. Prices are reasonable. The loaded tots are addictive.
reviews.author: Chris D.

reviews.text: Way too loud and crowded. Food was fine but nothing to write home about. Service was slow. Probably won't go back.
reviews.author: Janet F.

reviews.text: Best wings in Louisville, hands down. The dry rub options are fantastic. Great beer selection. Bartenders are knowledgeable and friendly.
reviews.author: Kevin B.

reviews.text: Solid neighborhood bar with better-than-average food. The pulled pork sandwich is excellent. Gets very busy during game days.
reviews.author: Lisa G.

reviews.text: This is what a gastropub should be. Creative menu, good execution, fair prices. The patio is dog-friendly which is a big plus.
reviews.author: Nathan W.

reviews.text: Great place for after-work drinks and apps. The nachos could feed a small army. Service is usually quick. No reservations so arrive early.
reviews.author: Emily S.

reviews.text: Decent bar food. Nothing exceptional but nothing terrible either. The beer selection saves it. Staff is hit or miss.
reviews.author: Robert T.

reviews.text: Love the laid-back atmosphere. Food is consistently good. The fish tacos are my favorite. Great spot to catch up with friends.
reviews.author: Amanda C.

reviews.text: Good food, good beer, good times. The burgers are juicy and cooked perfectly. Can get smoky which bothers some people.
reviews.author: David J.

reviews.text: One of my favorite bars in Louisville. The staff remembers regulars. Food is way better than it needs to be for a bar. Love this place.
reviews.author: Megan V.

reviews.text: Great spot for casual dinner. The fried pickles are addictive. Lots of TV screens for sports. Parking can be challenging.
reviews.author: Tyler N.

reviews.text: Don't judge this book by its cover. Looks like a dive but the food is incredible. The chef knows what they're doing. Highly recommend.
reviews.author: Sarah M.

reviews.text: Okay bar with okay food. Nothing special but fine for a casual meal. Beer prices are reasonable.
reviews.author: William D.

reviews.text: Perfect neighborhood bar. Good food, good drinks, good people. The trivia nights are fun. This is a Louisville staple.
reviews.author: Jennifer and Mark L.
